text: Egha aning uaning mɨgɨavɨra itima, Jekopɨn otariba uamategha ize. Me kamaghɨn oregha gɨfa, Sekem men buaramizim arazir kurabar a gami, ezɨ men naviba ikuvizɨ me puvɨram atari. Arazir Sekem Jekopɨn guivim gamizir kam, Israelian damazimɨn bar arazir kuram. Guizbangɨra, Israelian nɨghnɨzimɨn nɨ arazir katam damuan bar markiam.
